Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Provides a list of interfaces that must be implemented by applications to conform with the framework

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISCEventListener  
    ISCUIAuthenticationProvider
    All application provided AuthenticationProvider will need to implement this class.
    ISCUIAuthorizationProvider
    All AuthorizationProvider will need to implement this method.
    ISCUIDataType  
    ISCUIDataTypeProvider
    Provider interface which defines the contract that the framework expects from any Data Type Hanling Mechanism.
    ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider
    This interface needs to be implemented if differential extensibility needs to be achieved with framework automatically picking up extension mashUps, JSlib and jsp files from specific path.
    ISCUIExtensionsPathProviderV2
    This interface needs to be implemented if differential extensibility needs to be achieved with framework automatically picking up extension mashUps, JSlib and jsp files from specific path.
    ISCUIHomePageProvider
    Utility interface which provides the capability to redirect users to their specific home pages after a successful login.
    ISCUIHttpSessionAware
    Any class that implements this interface or any interface that extends this interface will be in turn dependent on the session validity.
    ISCUILocale
    This is a locale interface provided by the framework.
    ISCUILocalizationProvider
    A provider interface for localization at server.
    Before making a call for localization Application will have to register an implementation of ISCUILocalizationProvider with the framework.
    ISCUIMashup
    All mashup execution classes will need to implement this interface.
    ISCUIMashupMerger
    ISCUIMashupMerger is the interface that all MashupMerger class will implement.
    ISCUIOIDCAuth  
    ISCUIPostAuthenticationProvider
    All application provided PostAuthenticationProvider will need to implement this class.
    ISCUIResourcePermission
    The implementation of this interface is used to define all the permission for a resource given by a ResourceId during the authorization.
    ISCUISecureCookieProvider
    All application provided SecureCookieProvider will need to implement this class.
    ISCUISecureTokenGenerator
    All application provided SecureTokenGenerator will need to implement this class.
    ISCUISessionAware
    Any class that implements this interface or any interface that extends this interface will be in turn dependent on the session validity.
    ISCUISessionChangeAware
    Interface which needs to be implemented and plugged-in by objects that need to handle session change.
    ISCUISessionUserChangeAware
    Interface which needs to be implemented and plugged-in by objects which have a dependency on the currently logged in user.
    ISCUIStatisticsProvider  
    ISCUITransactionContext
    ISCUITransactionContext interface need to be implemented by the class that manages transaction in the application TransactionProvider.
    ISCUITransactionContextFactory
    All application provided transaction context factory classes need to implement this interface.

Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions Description

Provides a list of interfaces that must be implemented by applications to conform with the framework
